import { Text } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import { MessageBar } from '@looker/components'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'

<Meta component={Text} title="Docs/Text" />

<MessageBar intent="warn" noActions>
  NOTE: This component has been deprecated. Use `Span` component instead for a
  more predictable behavior
</MessageBar>

The Text component outputs a `span` HTML element with specified props.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

This component has a historic "quirk" where the `font-size` defaults to medium rather
than simply inheriting it's size from the parent DOM element (what one might expect of a
"normal" inline element. `line-height` will match the `font-size` (`medium` unless otherwise specified) as well.

<ArgsTable of={Text} exclude={excludedProps} />
